name: Llama God
description:
Climb the corporate ladder by sacrificing your coworkers to the Llama god. Fulfill your daily duties while finding time in your day to make enough sacrifices to appease the llama god.

Hold M to open the task menu. Press Space to interact with objects. Click text boxes to begin typing in them.

Learn more about the project on the Global Game Jam page.

http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/llama-god
